title: Profile
subtitle: Manage your personal information and professional details

careerInfo.title: Career Information
careerInfo.subtitle: Manage your professional background that will be used across all your CVs

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.subtitle: Your name and contact details
basicInfo.emailNote: Email is managed through your account settings

professionalLinks.title: Professional Links
professionalLinks.subtitle: Add links to your professional profiles

defaultCvSettings.title: Default CV Settings
defaultCvSettings.subtitle: Set default values for new CVs
defaultCvSettings.taglinePlaceholder: e.g., Senior Software Engineer | React & Node.js
defaultCvSettings.taglineNote: This will be used as the default tagline for new CVs
defaultCvSettings.mottoNote: A quote or motto that represents your professional philosophy

workExperience.pageSubtitle: Manage your work history that will be used across all your CVs
workExperience.endDateError: End date cannot be before start date

education.pageSubtitle: Manage your education history that will be used across all your CVs
education.endDateError: End date cannot be before start date

skills.pageSubtitle: Manage your skills organized by category
skills.skillsPlaceholder: Type a skill and press Enter

certifications.pageSubtitle: Manage your professional certifications and licenses
certifications.name: Certification Name
certifications.expiryNote: Leave empty if it doesn't expire
certifications.expiryDateError: Expiry date cannot be before issue date
certifications.uploadFailedDescription: The certification was created but the document could not be uploaded. You can add it later.

references.pageSubtitle: Manage your professional references. Add contact information, upload reference letters, and link them to specific positions.
references.linkedWorkNote: Link this reference to a specific position from your work experience
references.testimonialPlaceholder: A brief testimonial or recommendation quote...
references.uploadNote: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, WebP, PDF (Max 10MB)
references.uploadFailedDescription: The reference was created but the document could not be uploaded. You can add it later.
references.invalidFileType: Please upload an image (JPG, PNG, WebP) or PDF file
references.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than 10MB

photoUpload.dragDrop: Drag and drop your photo here
photoUpload.helpText: JPEG, PNG, or WebP up to 10MB
photoUpload.invalidType: Invalid file type. Please upload JPEG, PNG, or WebP images.
photoUpload.fileTooLarge: File too large. Maximum size is 10MB.

motivationVision.pageSubtitle: Your professional vision, mission, and what drives you
motivationVision.visionPlaceholder: Where do you see yourself professionally in the future?
motivationVision.missionPlaceholder: What is your professional mission statement?
motivationVision.purposePlaceholder: What is your deeper purpose in your career?
motivationVision.whatDrivesYouPlaceholder: What motivates you in your work?
motivationVision.whyThisFieldPlaceholder: Why did you choose this field or profession?
motivationVision.careerGoalsPlaceholder: What are your short-term and long-term career goals?
motivationVision.passionsPlaceholder: Enter a passion and press Enter
motivationVision.howPassionsRelateTitle: How Your Passions Relate to Work
motivationVision.howPassionsRelatePlaceholder: Describe how your passions connect to your professional life

highlights.pageSubtitle: Career highlights, achievements, and unique value propositions
highlights.titlePlaceholder: e.g., Led team to 40% productivity increase
highlights.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe this highlight or achievement in detail

projects.pageSubtitle: Key projects you've worked on throughout your career
projects.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the project and your contributions
projects.technologiesPlaceholder: Type a technology and press Enter
projects.endDateError: End date cannot be before start date
projects.outcomePlaceholder: What were the results or impact of this project?
